import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'redux' import './header.styles.scss' import {ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../images/header.svg' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {auth} from '../../FireBase/firebase.utils' const headerComponent=({currentUser})=>{ return(
Shop Now Contact {currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>Sign Out
: Sign In }
) } export default headerComponent
